alert.note: Alert for Cascades in Lane County; Northern Oregon Cascades (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 06 at 3:40PM PST until December 08 at 6:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 6 PM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches, except up to one inch below 2000 feet. * WHERE...Northern Oregon Cascades and Cascades in Lane County. * WHEN...From 4 AM to 6 PM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Highest snowfall rates will be before noon for the Cascades north of Santiam Pass, then after noon south.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map

area.areaDesc: Cascades in Lane County; Northern Oregon Cascades
